title: The Bracelet
description: When college student, Aislinn Kennedy, goes to bed at night, a mysterious event keeps happeningâshe's being tucked in at night by what she thinks is a ghost.Although she has a boyfriend named Eddie, who doesn't pay any attention to her, she tries to entice him into making love to her, but he always refuses, telling her that he's too tired and that he works hard at his job as a cop. When she starts getting tucked in by something unseen, she thinks she should be scared, but she's actually comforted by the feeling she gets every night and tells the ghost not to go.But, this is no ghost that is tucking her in at night. Immortal, Prince Alaric Velstar of Polasia, from a whole other dimension away, where time doesn't mean much, enlists the aid of Sauron, the castle wizard, to make a magical bracelet that will bring Aislinn to Polasia, for there is a secret about her that she doesn't even know aboutâshe is the long lost daughter of Sauron, and she's also an Angel.Both Alaric and Sauron wish for Aislinn to come to Polasia, but it has to be her choice.What will she choose? To stay on Earth with her family and to go to school and remain in a loveless relationship with Eddie, or to go to a strange land where monsters roam and need to be fought, and where, she to, will become immortal.
author: Beth Muscat
